metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, sentinel. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The name of the Log Analytics workspace to which this workbook will be associated
The Resource Group of the Log Analytics workspace to which this workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

    h@'https://www.cisa.gov/sites/default/files/csv/known_exploited_vulnerabilities.csv'
]
with (format='csv', ingestionMapping='[{"Column":"CveId","Properties":{"Ordinal":"0"}}]')
|where CveId != 'cveID';
Cves
| join kind=rightsemi (EasmAssetWebComponent_CL
    |where WorkspaceName_s == workspace
    |where SnapshotDateTime_t != '{_la_oldest_snapshot}'
    |where isnotempty(WebComponentCves_s)
    |where WebComponentLastSeen_t {_la_lastseen:query}
    |extend WebComponentCves_j = parse_json(WebComponentCves_s)
    |mv-expand WebComponentCves_j
    |extend Cve = tostring(WebComponentCves_j.Cve), Cwe = tostring(WebComponentCves_j.Cwe), CvssScore = tolong(WebComponentCves_j.CvssScore), Cvss3Score = toreal(WebComponentCves_j.Cvss3Score)
    |where (CvssScore >= cvssscore or Cvss3Score >= cvss3score)
    |summarize hint.strategy=shuffle arg_max(SnapshotDateTime_t, *) by AssetUuid_g,WebComponentName_s,WebComponentVersion_s,Cve
    |project-keep WebComponentCategory_s,WebComponentName_s,WebComponentVersion_s,Cve,Cwe,CvssScore,Cvss3Score,AssetName_s,WebComponentLastSeen_t
) on $left.CveId == $right.Cve

//|sort by WebComponentLastSeen_t desc
